require-dc-write.description: Whether the document requires distributed content upload

network-location.description: The network location for distributed content write.

format.description: The format of the content uploaded.

content-length.description: The byte count of the content uploaded. A comma separated list can be used to define multiple values for this parameter.

async.description: Whether async upload when distributed content writing.

all-primary.description: Whether save all contents as primary on different pages.

modifier.description: uniquely identifies a rendition within the same page number and format for a document. If there already exists a rendition with the supplied page_modifier (at the given format and page) the rendition will be overwritten. If null is passed then page_modifier is set to empty string.

content-charset.description: The charset of the content uploaded.

content-count.description: The count of the content uploaded.

require-ip-network-location.description: Whether a BOCS url for a document content upload need to be selected  based on client IP address

require-checksum.description: Specifies the query parameter for Checksum
